scripts.test: concurrently -p "[{name}]" -n "API,WEB" -c "magenta.bold,blue.bold" "npm run --prefix api test" "npm run --prefix web test"
scripts.install: npm run --prefix api install:dependencies && npm run --prefix web install:dependencies
scripts.prune: concurrently -p "[{name}]" -n "API,WEB" -c "magenta.bold,blue.bold" "npm run --prefix api prune:dependencies" "npm run --prefix web prune:dependencies"
scripts.build: concurrently -p "[{name}]" -n "API,WEB" -c "magenta.bold,blue.bold" "npm run --prefix api build" "npm run --prefix web build"
scripts.start-all:dev: concurrently -p "[{name}]" -n "API,WEB" -c "magenta.bold,blue.bold" "npm run --prefix api start:dev" "npm run --prefix web start:dev"
scripts.start-all:prod: concurrently -p "[{pid}][{name}]" -n "API,WEB" -c "magenta.bold,blue.bold" "npm run --prefix api start:prod" "npm run --prefix web start:prod"
